name: Tribute
description:
While Elian is openly suffering from depression, Emily is scared to admit she has the same problem and she wants to lift his spirits up instead.

The final project for a Game Writing course. Approx. playing time: 10-15 minutes.

(contains possible spoilers) CONTENT WARNING: depression, allusion to suicide, mention of death, slight mention of alcohol abuse

The game still has a few places that need to be altered, but they're minor and do not significantly affect the gameplay.
